name: Member Age Groups
query:
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN birth_date IS NULL THEN 'Unknown'
    WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), birth_date) / 365.25) < 18 THEN 'Under 18'
    WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), birth_date) / 365.25) BETWEEN 18 AND 22 THEN '18-22'
    WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), birth_date) / 365.25) BETWEEN 23 AND 27 THEN '23-27'
    WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), birth_date) / 365.25) BETWEEN 28 AND 32 THEN '28-32'
    WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), birth_date) / 365.25) BETWEEN 33 AND 37 THEN '33-37'
    WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), birth_date) / 365.25) BETWEEN 38 AND 42 THEN '38-42'
    WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), birth_date) / 365.25) BETWEEN 43 AND 47 THEN '43-47'
    WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), birth_date) / 365.25) BETWEEN 48 AND 52 THEN '48-52'
    WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), birth_date) / 365.25) BETWEEN 53 AND 57 THEN '53-57'
    WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), birth_date) / 365.25) BETWEEN 58 AND 62 THEN '58-62'
    WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), birth_date) / 365.25) BETWEEN 63 AND 67 THEN '63-67'
    WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), birth_date) / 365.25) >= 68 THEN '68+'
  END as age_group,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM `tabMember` 
WHERE status IN ('Active', 'Pending')
GROUP BY age_group
ORDER BY 
  CASE age_group
    WHEN 'Under 18' THEN 1
    WHEN '18-22' THEN 2
    WHEN '23-27' THEN 3
    WHEN '28-32' THEN 4
    WHEN '33-37' THEN 5
    WHEN '38-42' THEN 6
    WHEN '43-47' THEN 7
    WHEN '48-52' THEN 8
    WHEN '53-57' THEN 9
    WHEN '58-62' THEN 10
    WHEN '63-67' THEN 11
    WHEN '68+' THEN 12
    ELSE 13
  END
